# GEO Ox - Generative Engine Optimization Suite

> **Optimize for the Age of AI** - A premium SaaS platform with 18 specialized micro-tools for AI (GEO) and SEO optimization.

## Site Overview
- **Name**: GEO Ox
- **Purpose**: To help websites improve their visibility in AI-powered search engines (like ChatGPT, Perplexity, Gemini) and traditional SEO.
- **URL**: https://geoox.com (Assumed based on context, locally localhost:3000)

## Core Tools
GEO Ox provides 18 specialized tools divided into three categories:

### 1. Infrastructure & Technical Tools
- **Technical Readiness Checker**: Verifies robots.txt, sitemap, SSL, and canonical tags.
- **Schema Generator**: Creates validated JSON-LD structured data.
- **Core Web Vitals Fixer**: Analyzes performance and optimizes images.
- **Mobile Auditor**: Checks visual mobile rendering.
- **Link Fixer**: Auto-generates 404 redirect rules.
- **JS Rendering Checker**: Verifies content visibility without JavaScript.

### 2. AI & Semantic Optimization
- **AI Citation Checker**: Tracks brand mentions in AI search results.
- **AI Content Scorer**: Analyzes content readability for LLMs.
- **llms.txt Generator**: Creates AI-optimized documentation files.
- **Answer-First Structure**: Optimizes content for answer engines.
- **Semantic SEO Mapper**: Identifies entity gaps in content.
- **Citation Authority Builder**: Finds unlinked brand mentions.
- **Authority Checker**: Visualizes topic clusters.

### 3. Content & Audit Tools
- **General Audit**: Performs competitive gap analysis.
- **Linking Suggester**: AI-powered internal link recommendations.
- **SERP Previewer**: Previews metadata across multiple platforms.
- **Duplicate Finder**: Identify content fingerprints.
- **LSI Keyword Extractor**: Extracts latent semantic keywords.
